title: Recapping Episode 9 of â€˜Winning Time: The Rise of the Lakers Dynasty'
description:
Bill Simmons, Chris Ryan, and Wosny Lambre react to Episode 9 of the HBO docuseries about the 1980s Celtics-Lakers rivalry. The guys discuss events that the series has glossed over, the portrayal of Kareem Abdul-Jabbar, impressive acting jobs, and predictions for the 10th and final episode.
Hosts: Bill Simmons, Chris Ryan, Wosny Lambre
Producer: Troy Farkas
